ygData.subject: Re: re:patch probs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Dear readers, Just to update.. I am currently in the cable company.. they are doing 1-10mb per minute.. manage to download WHOLE EQ, took up 2.741gig
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Wulfric Rennison" <wulftech@e...>
wrote:
> This may or may not be here nor there, but it appears to me that

Dear readers,
Just to update.. I am currently in the cable company.. they are doing
1-10mb per minute.. manage to download WHOLE EQ, took up 2.741gig
(somehow eq resize most sounds from GoD from a bigger files to
smaller ones, perhaps to ease the lag).. EQ full install with patch,
goes down from 2.79 to 2.74gig..

All's well but this time not ends well.. as those files downloaded
using patch, didnt shown the date.. I mean the eqfeartintros.pak
shown it as a feb 2004 files, some like ldonequip file shown as a
2003 files.. so, our initial plan to JUST copy the 76/150mb file to
ONE cd has become moot, as we do NOT know which files had been d/led
by the patch (GRR should had just carry my PC with my harddisk along,
but the cable staff was saying that my pc might not have network lan
card)..

Short version is.. from network pc no 12 to transfer to pc no 1 that
has burning cd drive.. I had to separate the EQ folder that has
2.74gig files into 5/6 separate folders and then transfer EACH of
that folder to pc no 1 so that Nero could read and then burn every
one of that disc. Currently transferring folder no 1 to pc no 1 and
it took roughly 30min for 600+mb.. estimation time of finish would be
3-6 hours and the thought of going back to my home and bringing my pc
back to the cable center then do the 2 hours round trip, not counting
the downloading time that might took 4 hours then.. then..

GRR another frustated hobbit..
